name: The Magic Maze
description:
The Magic Maze is a fast paced action 2d game with an 8-bit art-style, made in unity

The game has a procedurally generated level that has 5 diferent areas, the desert, the cave, the village, and the slime area, where they are is presented on the intro of the game, the goal is to collect the two pieces of the dualforce, one located in the caves and the other on the slime area and then fight the final boss

This game took me about a month to create, it was a very quick project I made, because I wanted to finish a game, I would always have big ideas and try to do big games but then I would never finish them, but with this game, i made sure it wasn't to big so that I could make it in one week, it ended up taking a bit more time thant that, but I was able to finish it
